long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introduction: Welcome to "My Dolphin Show"! In this game, you will play as a dolphin trainer, commanding adorable dolphins to perform various high-difficulty acts. The game offers a wide range of features, including skin customization and skill upgrades, allowing you to immerse yourself in the joy of performing. Get ready for applause from the audience and endless entertainment!

Key Features:

Thrilling and Exciting Performances: "My Dolphin Show" provides players with a variety of challenging performance acts. Your dolphins will showcase amazing skills and agility in water and air. With precise controls and timing, you can make your dolphins flip, jump, and pass through hoops with stunning maneuvers. Each successful performance will bring cheers from the audience and a sense of accomplishment.
Diverse Skin Customization: Thegame offers a wide range of cute dolphin skins for you to choose from, allowing your dolphins to exude different charms. From classic dolphin appearances to fantastical themed skins, you can customize your team of performers according to your preferences and moods, creating a unique and eye-catching ensemble.
Skill Upgrades and Advancements: As you progress in the game, you can earn coins through performances to upgrade your dolphins' skills. Enhance their jumping height, speed, and agility to enable them to perform even more thrilling acts. You can also unlock new skills and special moves, showcasing more remarkable talents.
Compete with Global Players: In "My Dolphin Show," you can engage in competitions and challenges with players from around the world, showcasing your performance skills and the charm of your dolphins. By participating in competitions, you can earn generous rewards and honor, elevating your position on the global leaderboard.
